name: muebles-artesanales-ecommerce
description: E-commerce para venta de muebles artesanales hechos con madera reciclada

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint || true
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm run test && cd ../backend && npm run test || true
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/.tmp
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
